demo.description: Offline-safe demo provider used only when all real data sources fail. Returns predictable placeholder financial data.

metadata.notes: Used as final fallback only. Never the primary source.

fmp.description: High-volume market data provider offering currency, equities, commodities and indices. Chosen as primary FX source for Promagen due to reliability and generous API limits.

metadata.quota_notes: Free tier supports generous requests; paid tiers offer higher precision and volume.

twelvedata.description: Reliable financial data provider offering FX, crypto and equities. Used as the first backup when the primary provider fails.

metadata.quota_notes: Ideal as a backup FX provider. Free tier offers sufficient coverage for Promagen fallback flows.
